title: Monk's Belt
summaries: The Monk's Belt is a Hardmode accessory that increases the maximum number of sentries by one and increases summon damage by 10%. It is dropped by the Ogre during the Old One's Army event with a 8.33% / 12.5% (T2) or 4.17% (T3) chance.

statistics.Tooltip:
